Class Box

java.lang.Object
Box
public class Box extends Object
Represents a single cell (box) in the Minesweeper game grid.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Box()
    Constructs a new Box with default values.

      Reveals the content of the box.

      public boolean isMarked()
      Checks if the box is marked.
      Returns:
      True if the box is marked, false otherwise.

    • isRevealed

      public boolean isRevealed()
      Checks if the box is revealed.
      Returns:
      True if the box is revealed, false otherwise.

    • mark

      public void mark(boolean toMark)
      Sets the mark status of the box.
      Parameters:
      toMark - True to mark the box, false to unmark.

      Increments the count of adjacent mines for the box.

      public int getAdjacentMineCount()
      Gets the count of adjacent mines for the box.
      Returns:
      The count of adjacent mines.

    • getType

      public BoxType getType()
      Gets the type of the box.
      Returns:
      The type of the box (EMPTY, MINE, INDICATION).

      Sets the type of the box.
